title: Bronze Team, Just for fun
body:
Hey guys just wondering if anybody would be keen to start up a bronze team to play casually, i can play most lanes top/mid/jg/adc pref not to be support.

i play daily i have good net and dont dc, based in new zealand but dont mind anyone joining aus etc..

replies.body:
Would love to join! I'm in low bronze and just wanna play for fun! I really really highly prefer to {{summoner:11}} jungle. This is my strength and I tend to carry.
IGN: kanarya08
I'd like to play if it's just for fun
yeah im keen i main mid and top can play adc
yeah i will play aswell good adc and jg i am
id be keen to join adc jg main :)
Okay added you both my Names GoreGasmic

Yea ill join, im kinda desperate to find a bronze team.
I play: Mid, Top, Jg and supp
Sure haha, needed a ranked team for a while since I hate playing solo ranked, Im Aus so add me :)  SN: NeonPig
